title: Transcendence of Hecke-Mahler Series
authors: Florian Luca, Joel Ouaknine, James Worrell
abstract:
We prove transcendence of the Hecke-Mahler series $\sum_{n=0}^\infty
f(\lfloor n\theta+\alpha \rfloor) \beta^{-n}$, where $f(x) \in \mathbb{Z}[x]$
is a non-constant polynomial $\alpha$ is a real number, $\theta$ is an
irrational real number, and $\beta$ is an algebraic number such that
$|\beta|>1$.
subjects: Computer Science/Formal Languages and Automata Theory
